body.name: Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set, Hands Free Flat Floor Mop and Bucket, 3 Washable Microfiber Pads Included, Wet and Dry Use, Home Floor Cleaning System for All Floor Types and Windows

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Mop and Buckets Set with 3 Pads
Mop and Buckets Set with 3 Pads Red
Mop and Buckets Set with 8 Pads

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 15 mins
features: REACH INTO ANY CORNERS: BOSHENG flat floor mop have 360°rotatable rectangular mop heads which makes it more suitable for cleaning corners and narrow spaces than triangular and round mops. Perfect for floor and window cleaning in home and office.
HANDS FREE SQUEEZE: Our flat mop head can automatically rebound within 30 degrees without touching. It can effectively prevent dirt from getting on your hands.

EXCLUSIVE BUCKET DESIGN: The bucket with 2 grooves, 1 for clean and the other for dry. With simple up and down, 2 scraping blades will help to clean the mop or control the level of moisture quickly and effectively.

COMPACT FOR EASY STORAGE: All pieces are compact enough to fit effortlessly inside the bucket. When you don't use it, just put household cleaning tools in the corner and never worry about taking up too much space.

MICROFIBER MOP PADS: The mop and bucket with wringer set has three microfiber pads with excellent water absorption that makes it perfect for wet and dry cleaning. You can wash the mop pads in the washing machine while maintaining effective cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this mop and bucket, no wringing mops by hand or pulling handles. Very easy to use, cleans floor thoroughly and h you can decide how much water on the mop, washes with no streaks and dries quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best smaller mop bucket ever
reviews.reviewText: Works so well. The mop is cleaned so well in the bucket the way it “wrings” the water out. Really good for getting mopping done quickly and easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a mop and bucket that was unwieldy. After surgery, I can't lift or push a heavy mop but I wanted to exercise and clean my house. This was the best compromise.I can do both with this mop and I love that it is easy to pick up and move as I work. I like that I can wash the pads afree every use, too.One drawback is that it is a tall bucket and I have to fill it either by using a separate vessel to to add the water or use a sink or shower to fill the tall bucket. My laundry sink faucet is too low to fill the bucket at the sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, cleans well
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It was a breeze to assemble it, I love how well you can get around the furniture and get to the hard to reach spots. It cleans well, I love the separate clean dry compartments. I have mixed feeling about the washing pad. The downfall is the durability of the Velcro pad.. it tears after a couple of uses and it gets stuck going in and out of the dry compartment. But I like how after you are done cleaning the floors you can just throw it in the washer/dryer and have a fresh and clean pad for next use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 1st mop broke on me. We’re all good now!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Update: I looked at my original packaging and realized the company extends a one year warranty on their mop and bucket system. Once I reached out to their customer service, and explained what happened, I was asked if I wanted a refund or replacement. I chose the latter because i loved this mop before it broke. One day earlier than expected, I received my replacement mop and bucket, and I’m so happy!!What I love:I love that, although when you get a mop you have to basically build you can feel the weakness in the stick but, this stick is sturdy. It doesn’t wobble in the joints. And the metal is firm, not flimsy.I love not having to bend over to wring anything out, and although I used to be biased against anything not a traditional cotton mop head, I don’t miss the random cotton braided stands all over the place after mopping.I love that I’m able to disinfect (most times with bleach) my floor without degrading the mop head. I love how effective it is at actually cleaning my floor without the extra weight of the wet “hair” slinging around behind it. It’s just a less strenuous job, yet still gets the job done. I’m a stickler for a clean floor, so I also love the fact that the mop pads can be swapped out and washed/disinfected as needed. So while one is dirty, I can just use another clean one.I love that the wringer not only extracts water, but also scrapes off any dust and debris that gets stuck to the mop pad.And that even when full, the bucket isn’t super heavy, so even on my floor’s deep cleaning days, I can easily empty my dirty water and refill with clean to mop a second time.The only thing I wish were different was if the dirty water went to a separate chamber, and not back into the clean soapy water.FYI: the lid does pop off and on fairly easily, so you can rinse everything out and off when you’re done.Original: Ironically the mop is sturdy, but the mop head broke at the hinge while I was using it. Before that, I absolutely loved this set, I'm disappointed that it snapped on me. I originally gave it 3 stars, but it’s back to 5 based on everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mop system works well on my sealed wood floors. I am able to remove excess water easily. Very light and effective. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MEST MOP EVER
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a new mom and bucket, just stop your search now. This is the absolute best mop I’ve ever owned. I LOVE IT!! So fast and easy. Didn’t know I could LIKE mopping. The love that you can control the wetness so well. So if I just need a quick mom and quick fry I make sure it is not super wet when dunking. Seriously just buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great for tile
reviews.reviewText: This was almost, but not quite, a really good mop. If I had an apartment with wood or laminate floors I’d probably give it 4 stars. There are a few things that made me look for a different option, though. It doesn’t get into my grout (like didn’t even get it wet or get crumbs up with using it as a dust mop) and that was the biggest deal breaker. Another was that, when using the bucket, you have to fill it all the way to the full line and maybe even top it off halfway through if you’re mopping a lot of area, otherwise the part of your mop that is always turned to the top (you can only instead the mop one direction into the bucket so the same part is always at the top) never gets fresh water on it. This means that there’s always part of your mop that stays either dirty or dry depending on how much water is in the bucket.Maybe I have unrealistic expectations in a mop, but the floors don’t feel all that clean due to these issues.Pros:lightweightEasy to storeGets right up to the baseboardsGood system for “ringing” with the bucket to get debris off when dry moppingBucket topper is very strong and attaches really well to the bucket, itself. I never felt like it was going to come off when carrying it and spill water all over.Mop pad attaches really well to the baseCons:Really small (for the amount of floors I have to clean)Handle is VERY short (I’m 5’3 on a good day and it was too short for me)Doesn’t get into groutAlways a part of the head doesn’t get water due to bucket set up (this would be solved if the head could flip either direction into the bucket.Bucket has to be completely full (same solution as above would fix this)Mop head flips into the “ringing” position really easily while using. Great for rinsing, but not for actually mopping
Todo tamaño color cantidad de agua exprime bien, aunque me gustaría más seco.

I love stuff that is really well engineered and well thought out. Whoever designed this put a lot of thought into it. The drying side does a good job of squeezing the excess water from the pad, and most of the water goes back into the rinse side. The parts seem to be good quality and it does a better job of actually cleaning than any other product I've owned from more well known manufacturers that either didn't work or broke in short order.The pads (you get three) are machine washable and much better quality than I've seen on similar products. It's a bit more expensive than others, but the quality of it suggests that it will last longer. You get what you pay for.A couple of very minor quibbles. I'm 6'2" so the handle is a little short for taller people. Would have been nice to have the option of one more segment to add to the length of the handle. Also, the circumference of the bottom of the bucket is small, which is great for storage but could make it a bit tippy when full of water, so you will want to be a little careful leaving it unattended around rambunctious kids or large dogs.
Got floorboard and can't be too wet, it would be perfect if the handle can be longer. Tall people find it difficult to mop. Overall very good quality and recommended

reviews.reviewTitle: Got it in match broken by June 1st wonderful to use when not broken
reviews.reviewText: I disliked that it broken and was only a few months old, disliked that I paid a huge amount of money for it
